summary: An internet protocol or “IP” address allows devices to send each other information over the internet. DOD began planning for its transition to the next version of IP in 2017, following at least 2 prior attempts to do so since 2003. But, DOD has yet to clearly define the magnitude of work involved, the level of resources required, and the extent or nature of cybersecurity...
title: Internet Protocol Version 6: DOD Needs to Improve Transition Planning
